sent.orig: Tenon foundation is tenon type integer block foundation slab of retaining wallof foundation slab.
sent.trans: 凸榫基础是在挡土墙底板底面设置一个与底板成整体的榫状凸块。

sent.orig: Foundation of the world are countries, foundation of country are families, foundation of family is oneself.
sent.trans: 天下之本在国，国之本在家，家之本在身。——《孟子》，这句怎么翻译啊？

sent.orig: The pile and the foundation to achieve the coordination of the foundation through the bedding cushion.
sent.trans: 桩体与基础不直接接触，它们之间通过褥垫层过渡，实现地基的协调工作。

sent.orig: The research was supported by the National Science Foundation and the L. S. B. Leakey Foundation.
sent.trans: 该研究是由美国国家科学基金会和L. S. B. 李基基金会提供支持的。

sent.orig: First IVE Foundation Diploma course tailor made for Ethnic Minorities funded by the Kadoorie Foundation.
sent.trans: 有幸得到嘉道理基金会赞助，开设首个专门为少数族裔而设的香港专业教育学院基本文凭课程。
